page.title: 06Biography. Education.
page.content: and a pair of trainers. My favourite pop group is Wham. {School Life. An Interview with Mr. {Offer.}We spoke to Mr. Offer the Head- master of our school. School takes up a lot of Mr. Offer's time, it is not just a 9_4 job he said. Mr. Offer came to this school 9 years ago as he felt he would prefer to work in a primary school. He thinks that in years to come teachers will be replaced and the school will improve and hopefully the 11+ exam will be abolished. The school rules were introduced by the teachers.They are based on common sense, safety and good manners. Parents voted for a school uniform.The colours are blue , grey and white. Mr. Offer's favourite subjects are Creative Writing and Maths.Downton Primary has a bell tower which is now out of use because of the risk of
